titles.title: A bill to extend the period during which a special agricultural worker may apply for adjustment of status of that of an alien lawfully admitted for temporary residence, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/25/1988--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act regarding the special agricultural workers program to: (1) extend the qualifying period for six months; and (2) extend the application period through December 31, 1986.
